page.title: 01TRANSPORT
page.content: CIVIL AIRPORT This airport is a unique feature on the outskirts of the city of Cambridge.It is privately owned by the Marshall Group. The grid position is 05480258. In 1938 the present airfield was opened and such was the enthusiasm of Mr. D.G.Marshall, who started it all, that he offered the facilities to all aircraft that wished to use them. This still holds good today. "Marshalls" are open 365 days a year, 24 hours a day. A Flying Club operates from the airfield and private planes are housed and serviced there. Marshalls are renowned, world wide, for their expertise in the modification of aircraft,especially their connection with the Hercules transport planes.
